title: How to check and update the latest Android version in Redmi smartphones - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to Settings=>About phone=>System Update=>Check For updates. If your mobile got any updates just click download and after download completion click reboot ( but before rebooting check whether mobile has <50 % battery , otherwise charge and then reboot it).

1)- Go to settings 2)- Click on about phone 3)- There you will see your android version To check if any update is available then click on the system update and if any update is available then the phone will show you
